scripts.clean-install-all: npm install && rimraf ui/node_modules && rimraf node_api/node_modules && rimraf im_library/node_modules && rimraf node_modules && npm run install-all
scripts.install-all: npm install && run-p install-library install-api install-ui
scripts.test:unit: cd im_library && npx vitest run && cd ../node_api && npx vitest run && cd ../ui && npx vitest run
scripts.test:coverage: cd im_library && npx vitest run --coverage && cd ../node_api && npx vitest run --coverage && cd ../ui && npx vitest run --coverage
